relnotes.name: Certificate and Key Management
relnotes.purpose: Certificate management supporting public key cryptography including storage and retrieval, assignment of trust status, certificate chain construction, validation and revocation.

defect.title: Forward Propogation from Symtb9.1 - Illegal dependency from OCSP to HTTP

relnotes.defect: OCSP is relocated to MW layer.

defect.title: [Coverity]-SYMBIAN.CLEANUP_STACK -security/certman

relnotes.defect: The object was pushed onto the cleanup stack before calling the leaving function

defect.title: [Coverity]-SYMBIAN.CLEANUP_STACK-security/tlsprovider

relnotes.defect: coverity issues fixed

defect.title: [Coverity]-SYMBIAN.CLEANUP_STACK-security/tlsprovider

relnotes.defect: coverity issues fixed

deliverystep.name: PREQ2193 SMP-Safe Crypto Services Components
deliverystep.preq: Add SMPSAFE keyword in SDP mmp files

defect.title: OCSP tries to make to OCSP check to empty URI if default URI is not defined

relnotes.defect: Instead of NULL verification KNullDesC8 is used

defect.title: security subsystem has two identical files called certstorepatchdata.h

relnotes.defect: certstorepatchdata.h removed from swicertstore. This file has been already exported to epoc32/include by filetokens. All references to this header file have been updated.

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Crypto Services: Core Delivery
deliverystep.preq: Delivers the main set of features for the Diran Early Phase. Includes the new components (SCR, SIF and STS), migration of the native installer to use the new components and most reference code. Excludes non-mandatory features and post-production plugin management.

defect.title: Change the reference in security to use new IWS RExplicitHttpSession

relnotes.defect: Reference in security changed to use new IWS RExplicitHttpSession

defect.title: Symbian, CX500DistinguishedName::ExactMatchL fails if DNs contain unsupported at

relnotes.defect: Add support for the PKCS#9 unstructuredName attribute

defect.title: Provide Test Cases for PDEF125098

relnotes.defect: Added test cases for case sensitive / case-insensitive comaprison of distinguished names in different encodings.

defect.title: Extra member qualifactions

relnotes.defect: Removed class name qualifier from declaration of CX509Certificate::DecodeCertsL

defect.title: Certificate name matching does not conform to RFC3280

relnotes.defect: Case IN-Sensitive comparisons for 'PrintableString' and 'IA5String' has been added as per RFC 3280 standard.

deliverystep.name: CR1393: Crypto Services: Multiple Certificate Stores Support

cr.title: Support for aggregation of several certificate databases in different rofs layers

deliverystep.cr: Support for aggregation of several certificate databases in different rofs layers

defect.title: GTCK_TCT_CAS: OCSP validation through a proxy server is not possible.

relnotes.defect: Added OCSP validation through a proxy server.

defect.title: Cannot install University of Helsinki root certificate to the phone

relnotes.defect: Increase the buffer size read in from file for certificate recognizer in order to handle non-conforming CA certificate

cr.title: X.509 Critical Extension for MIDP IMEI Binding

relnotes.cr: The PKIX certificate chain validator has been updated to accept a set of zero or more critical extension OIDs defined by the caller.

cr.title: Allow Certificate Validity Dates to be Ignored when Verifying SIS Controllers

relnotes.cr: Added a new Sis Registry API to check the integrity of installed applications without requiring that the signing certificate chain be valid for the current date and time.

defect.title: Certificate validation incorrectly handles the Key Usage and SAN extensions

relnotes.defect: Removed the SAN extension once it has been processed and added support for the Inhibit Any-Policy critical extension.

defect.title: ASN.1 GeneralizedTime does not completely conform to standard

relnotes.defect: gentimedec.cpp now fully supports decoding for any form of ASN.1 generalizedTime

defect.title: OCSP does not use local device time for validating responses

relnotes.defect: COCSPValidator::ValidationTime() uses local secure universal time instead of produceAt time if no specific validation time is supplied.

defect.title: Extra class qualification on a function

relnotes.defect: Remove extra class qualification on a function.

defect.title: Certificate Key Identifier returned does not match the certificate's Key Identif

relnotes.defect: Added a new function for CX509Certificate - SubjectKeyIdentifier. This fixes issues when a calculated key identifier is returned instead of the one present in the ceritificate.

defect.title: WLAN: Search for keys in CCheckedCertCtore.cpp incorrect

relnotes.defect: Allow EList state to return KErrNotFound in CCheckedCertStore::RunL()

defect.title: Remove/Ratify \TO\DO comments from security's test component - tpkixcert

relnotes.defect: Minor changes made to commenting and code to finish off leftover comments from the component "pkixcert".

defect.title: Remove/Ratify \TO\DO comments from security's test component - tcertstore

relnotes.defect: The comments in tcertstore have been fixed accordingly.

defect.title: IMPORT_C/EXPORT_C: ~CPKIXValidationResultBase()

relnotes.defect: Class destructor ~CPKIXValidationResultBase() now properly exported

deliverystep.name: EC073: Security: Crypto Services Header File Refactoring

ec.title: Crypto Services Header File Refactoring (to simplify the SDK creation process)

deliverystep.ec: Non-exported published functions made internal. Status added to published files if it was missing. Some classes made publishedPartner from internal because it was referenced from a publishedPartner interface. Removed internal header file inclusions. BR2143 raised against this.

deliverystep.name: Security - Alignment of CBR and System Model components

preq.title: Alignment of CBR and System Model components

deliverystep.preq: Removed swicertstoretool from certman and added as a part of swi devicetools.

defect.title: TBAS (T3648_Symbian_OS_v9.5) DP tests hang at tasn1_log.txt

relnotes.defect: Fixed the test hang (in tasn1.txt) by adding a CSystemRandom to test threat (tasn1.exe) to avoid construct/destruct (hw initialisation) delay.

defect.title: www.nhs.net can't be accessed

relnotes.defect: Remove the name validation when building RFC822 name tree.

defect.title: Clean up build's tagscan errors

relnotes.defect: Removed tagscan errors

defect.title: Remove/Ratify \TO\DO comments from security's taddtionalcertstore

relnotes.defect: Update copyright, implement , remove meaningless comments, update comments

defect.title: Lint errors in security code should be fixed (production and test)

relnotes.defect: Minor changes to remove lint errors

defect.title: Remove/Ratify \TO\DO comments from security's tocsp

relnotes.defect: Change in tocsp. update copyright and doxygen comments. remove meaningless comments.

defect.title: Remove/Ratify \TO\DO comments from security's tcertdump and unifiedcertstore

relnotes.defect: change in tcertdump and unifiedcertstore. Add doxygen comments. Update copyright. remove meaningless comments. add function to dump issuer’s altname.

defect.title: Remove/Ratify \TO\DO comments from security's test component - tcertcommon

relnotes.defect: Clean up tcertcommon. Remove meaningless comments. update copyright and code according to the coding standard.

defect.title: CX509Certificate::ConstructL() does not copy the certificate version number

relnotes.defect: Version has been copied. Incorrect version check has been removed. Comment added that version check is not been done in order to maintain binary compatibility.

defect.title: Computed SubjectKeyId of CA certificate doesn't match with the value given in Su

relnotes.defect: Fixed handling of SubjectKeyId for CA certificates

defect.title: [BR2067] Downgrade CPKCS10Attributes classification level and deprecate method

relnotes.defect: CPKCS10Attributes classification level downgraded from publishedAll to publishedPartner and AddAttributeL method deprecated.

defect.title: CX500DistinguishedName::IsWithinSubtreeL should not be order-dependant

relnotes.defect: CX500DistinguishedName::IsWithinSubtreeL now accepts matching attributes in any order, before they had to also be in matching order.
relnotes.preq: TOOLS2 macro is added with TOOLS.

defect.title: Test perl script certstorePlugins should be moved

relnotes.defect: From V9.4 onwards the certstorePlugins file is moved from //PR/share/DABSRelease/buildscripts/projects/security/zephyr to //EPOC/DV3/team/2006/security/master/defectsA/security/certman/twtlscert/scripts/batchfiles. The older version of the file is kept untouched for the reference of earlyer OS versions(Till 9.3). Corresponding ONB test files are updated towards the new location of the certstorePlugins.
relnotes.preq: Changed according to filename policy to support the building of Symbian OS on both Windows and Linux for the test code.

cr.title: Add Support for PKCS#10 to Security

relnotes.cr: Made substantial changes to the implementation of PKCS#10 and changed access to publishedPartner. Also added tests for testing the PKCS#10 implementation.

defect.title: Test Failure in testasyncancel in panicscan.pl

relnotes.defect: In COCSPTransportHttpPost::DoCancel() one more iStatus check point is added before calling the request completion. This is to handle the exceptional situation in which after starting execution of the DoCancel(), the asynchronous request is getting completed normally and calling again the request completion one more time leads to the stray signal and ends up in Panic - E32USER-CBase 46.

defect.title: UnifiedKeyStore can't get Key Manager Interface from keystore token plugin

relnotes.defect: UnifiedKeyStore cannot get Key Manager Interface from keystore token plugin

defect.title: Makesis & SWI assumes system drive is c:

relnotes.defect: Removed hardcoded references to C drive and replaced with system drive.

defect.title: Remove SYMBIAN_PKCS12 #ifdefs from code

relnotes.defect: Removed SYMBIAN_PKCS12 #ifdefs from code.

defect.title: OID parsing error can cause X509.v3 extensions to be eclipsed.

relnotes.defect: Fixed OID decoding defect . Values which caused an overflow were incorrectly truncated. TASN1DecObjectIdentifier now leaves with KErrOverflow.
